article.title: Rockwell Collins to Provide Common Avionics Architecture System
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Rockwell Collins Incorporated, Cedar Rapids, Iowa, is being awarded a $1,800,000 minimum, $45,889,155 maximum, firm-fixed-price, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for Common Avionics Architecture System component parts.Â U.S. Special Operations Command, MacDill Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity.
